entry.source: It's rare to come by {F872,1} these{F801}days. So, I'd like to request a job for{F801}Hunters to find {F804,5}{F872,1}{F804,0} for me.{F801}There are a lot of department stores in{F801}{F804,5}Shinjuku,{F804,0} so you might be able to find one{F801}over there. I'm counting on you.{F801}
